Rleg
====

This is a software to run in a [Gumstix - Overo](http://gumstix.org/) based embbed system.

## Requirements
#### 1. [Arm Cross Compiler](http://gumstix.org/basic-cross-compilation.html)
#### 2. [Doxygen](http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/download.html)

## Folders
 * doc : Folder to store the documentation generated by Doxygen
 * Matlab : Datalogger files to export to Matlab
 * src : Source Code
